metadata.synopsis: AD played when the player finds or fails to find Oliver during hide & seek.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Choose to play with Oliver, and approach the cart at 61.609 44.256 26.425 to trigger the perception check.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Where'd that child go? Or... whatever it is.
0.context: NodeContext: Stumped, looking for Oliver Found Oliver (a little shadow/phantom boy they're playing hide and seek with)

1.speaker: Player
1.text: There you are - come on out.
1.context: NodeContext: Found Oliver (a little shadow/phantom boy they're playing hide and seek with)
